item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Man. I used to get so frustrated when I lost to someone who would play unconventionally like that. However, now I am just trying to be creative and think ways to creatively counter it! =)
item.content:encoded: Man. I used to get so frustrated when I lost to someone who would play unconventionally like that. However, now I am just trying to be creative and think ways to creatively counter it! =)

item.title: By: Eyecatcher
item.dc:creator: Eyecatcher
item.description: Very good idea! Great post. I had a game yesterday against black player, he starts at tengen and everytime i played a 4/4 he invaded san san ;-p very strange... in the end i lost the game. I thought... why not try it out next time myself this fuseki?! Why not experiment more, we have nothing to loose only 1 or two stones rank... but that is not important isn't it?! The board is open and wide we can try out new things when ever we want :)
item.content:encoded:
Very good idea! Great post.
I had a game yesterday against black player, he starts at tengen and everytime i played a 4/4 he invaded san san ;-p very strange… in the end i lost the game. I thought… why not try it out next time myself this fuseki?! Why not experiment more, we have nothing to loose only 1 or two stones rank… but that is not important isn’t it?!
The board is open and wide we can try out new things when ever we want ðŸ™‚
